A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing! Left theatres feeling empty\, unsatisfied and not much excited for the next instalment. The plot lacks direction and the pace of the film is a mess. The humour feels out of place/forced (no pun intended) and is basically silly at times to the detriment of the characters. It does have some surprises but unfortunately they're only their for the purpose of subverting expectations and these decisions overall hurt the larger narrative. In conclusion it's mostly a disappointment because of the potential unrealised here and the lack of either understanding or respect for the source material.
